TEAM

Augustine Nyeche, PMHNP

Warm Solution Oriented Direct Experienced

Welcome. I'm Augustina Nyeche.

As your Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner (PMHNP), I am a specialized healthcare provider dedicated to diagnosing and treating mental health conditions. I work with individuals across the lifespan to develop personalized treatment plans that may include therapy, medication management, and lifestyle adjustments. My goal is to support clients in achieving optimal mental health, overall well-being and help you lead a fulfilling, balanced life, through compassionate, evidence-based care.

What can patients expect to take away from sessions with you?

In our first session, expect a welcoming and supportive space where we'll discuss your current concerns and mental health history. We'll explore your symptoms, medical background, and any previous treatments. This initial meeting helps me understand your unique situation and allows you to ask questions freely. From there, we'll collaborate to develop a treatment plan tailored specifically to your needs—whether that involves therapy, medication, or other strategies to support your mental well-being.

My Biggest Strengths
  • Empathy and Compassion: I provide a non-judgmental, supportive environment where you feel truly heard and valued.
  • Holistic Approach: I treat the whole person by combining evidence-based medical care with holistic strategies for overall wellness.
  • Collaborative Care: Your preferences and goals are central to building a personalized treatment plan we create together.
  • Strong Communication: Clear, open dialogue ensures you understand your options and feel comfortable sharing your concerns.
  • Expertise in Medication Management: With extensive psychopharmacology knowledge, I skillfully manage and adjust medications to optimize your mental health outcomes.
The Clients I'm Best Positioned to Serve

With over 7 years as an advanced practice nurse and 16 years of patient care experience, I am equipped to support individuals facing a variety of mental health challenges, including anxiety, depression, ADHD, bipolar disorder, PTSD, insomnia, and more. I work best with clients seeking compassionate, collaborative care that integrates medication management and therapeutic support alongside lifestyle and holistic interventions. Whether managing chronic conditions or addressing acute issues, I am here to support your mental health journey every step of the way.

ROSEWELL

At Rosewell Healthcare, our mission is to provide exceptional mental health services rooted in compassion, respect, and evidence-based practice. We strive to create a welcoming environment where every patient feels supported and empowered to take charge of their mental well-being.

Our goal is to deliver personalized care tailored to each individual's unique needs, combining clinical expertise with holistic approaches to foster healing and resilience. We are committed to helping our patients achieve lasting mental wellness and a balanced life by addressing their physical, emotional, and psychological health comprehensively.

At Rosewell, you are not alone—we are dedicated to walking with you on your path to improved mental health and a brighter tomorrow.
